hero.description: Passionate about creating modern, functional and user-centered web experiences.
hero.education_status: Final year student of Programming Technician at the University of Hurlingham.

about_section.title: About me
about_section.paragraph1: I'm currently 22 years old and I'm finishing my {degree} at {university}, a program I started in March 2022.
about_section.paragraph2: Throughout my studies, I gained knowledge in both front-end and back-end development, but recently I decided to focus mainly on {frontend}, specializing in {react} and creating modern, responsive interfaces centered on user experience.
about_section.paragraph3: I'm passionate about solving problems with code, learning new technologies, and collaborating on real projects that make an impact. I'm looking for my {first_job}, where I can contribute my skills and continue growing as part of a team.
about_section.first_job: first professional experience as a front-end developer

projects.title: Gym Control
projects.description: A web app to create, edit and track workout routines in a simple and effective way.

projects.title: Game: Connect 4
projects.description: Interactive version of Connect 4 made with React. I practiced states, components, game logic and animations to create a smooth and fun experience.

projects.title: Landing Page
projects.description: Basic landing page for a company selling a specific product.

contact_section.title: Contact
contact_section.cta: Interested in working together? Let's talk!
